MAIN_LAYOUT.FOOTER: xBull Wallet - An Open Source Stellar Wallet <br class="md:hidden"> created by Creit Tech

ERROR_MESSAGES.CANT_FETCH_ACCOUNT_FROM_HORIZON: There was an error when fetching your account from the network, make sure you are using the correct horizon and you have internet.
ERROR_MESSAGES.CANT_CONTACT_HORIZON: There was an unexpected error when requesting Horizon, make sure you have internet.
ERROR_MESSAGES.UNEXPECTED_ERROR: Unexpected error, try again or contact support.
ERROR_MESSAGES.CANT_SIGN_TRANSACTION: We couldn't sign the transaction, please check your password is correct
ERROR_MESSAGES.PASSWORD_NOT_SET: Global password has not being defined in this wallet
ERROR_MESSAGES.ALREADY_SAVED: Error, it's possible that you already saved it.
ERROR_MESSAGES.INVALID_XDR: We can't continue, XDR value is invalid
ERROR_MESSAGES.INVALID_PHRASE: Mnemonic phrases is invalid, please make sure you write/add word by word correctly
ERROR_MESSAGES.CANT_CONNECT_LEDGER_1: We were not able to connect with a Ledger wallet, make sure is connected to your computer and select it
ERROR_MESSAGES.CANT_PARSE_INCORRECT_FILE: We were not able to parse the file's data, this probably means is not a correct file
ERROR_MESSAGES.MAKE_SURE_FILE_TYPE: File type is not correct, make sure is a {{type}} file
ERROR_MESSAGES.CANT_DECRYPT_BACKUP_FILE: We were not able to decrypt the backup file, this means either the key file or the backup file are incorrect

SUCCESS_MESSAGE.BACKUP_IMPORTED: Backup imported correctly, you will be redirected automatically

FORM_PLACEHOLDERS.CODE_OR_ISSUER: Write the code or issuer key
FORM_PLACEHOLDERS.WORD_BY_WORD: Write and add word by word

ACCOUNT_BALANCE_CARD.BALANCE_EXPLANATION: This is the value of the total balance in your wallet based on the counter asset you have selected (XLM is the default)
ACCOUNT_BALANCE_CARD.NAME: Account name:

SEND_PAYMENT.CUSTOM_ASSET_TO_NON_TRUSTED: We ca not send custom assets to an account that has not been created yet.
SEND_PAYMENT.CONFIRM_CREATE_ACCOUNT: Destination does not exist, are you sure you want to create the recipient's account?
SEND_PAYMENT.CONFIRM_CLAIMABLE_BALANCE: Destination does not has this asset, do you want to create a claimable balance instead (this requires 1 XLM locked until is claimed)?

ASSET_DETAILS.NATIVE_TOKEN_MESSAGE: Native token of the Stellar Blockchain

SWAP.NO_VALID_PATH: There is no valid path to make the swap.
SWAP.INCORRECT_SELECTION: Type of path selected is not Send or Receive, contact support
SWAP.STRICT_TOOLTIP: You can specify if you prefer to base the swap on the max amount you want to send or minimum amount to receive
SWAP.SLIPPAGE_TOOLTIP: Swaps have slippages, this is the max percentage you are willing to tolerate
SWAP.MIN_RECEIVE_TOOLTIP: Min amount you will receive according to your slippage tolerance
SWAP.MAX_SEND_TOOLTIP: Max amount you will send according to your slippage tolerance

WALLET_ACCOUNT.COPY_PRIVATE_KEY_CONTENT: You're about to copy your private key to the clipboard. We recommend you that after you have use it, copy something else so is removed from your clipboard and if your device keep clipboard records, delete it from there too.
WALLET_ACCOUNT.COPY_PRIVATE_KEY_CONTENT_SUCCESS: Copied to the clipboard, do not forget about removing it from your clipboard later
WALLET_ACCOUNT.REMOVE_ACCOUNT_CONTENT: You're about to remove your account from this wallet. Make sure you have a backup of it before removing it.

REGISTERED_WALLET_DETAILS.REMOVE_WALLET_ALERT: You're going to remove this wallet from this extension, your assets are safe in the blockchain but make sure you have a way to recover your private keys. Once it's removed we can't get it back until you create it again with your recover method

LOCKING.DEVICE_AUTH_DISABLED: Device Auth is now disabled for password protected features.
LOCKING.DEVICE_AUTH_ENABLED: Device Auth is now active for password protected features.
LOCKING.KEEP_PASSWORD_DISABLED: Option disabled, now when using your password this one won't be kept.
LOCKING.KEEP_PASSWORD_ENABLED: Option enabled, your password will be kept for a few minutes after using it.
LOCKING.DONT_REQUEST_PASSWORD_TOOLTIP: If you enable this option, your password will be saved in the device after you use it. It will be kept during a period of time or until the session is ended
LOCKING.PASSWORD_TIMEOUT_TOOLTIP: Total of minutes before you will need to write your password again if the session hasn't been closed
LOCKING.FOOTER_MESSAGE: Locking settings change depending on the platform being used

BACKGROUND.SET_BACKGROUND_TITLE: Set a background for your wallet
BACKGROUND.BACKGROUND_SUGGESTION: A dark background is recommended so you can read everything easier.

SPAM_KEYS.EXPLANATION: Transactions where these keys are the "source", will be ignored in this Wallet

ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: xBull is a powerful but easy to use wallet which is aimed to serve as a bridge between websites/users and the Stellar Blockchain

ADD_ACCOUNT.UNABLE_TO_SAVE_ACCOUNT: We were not able to add the new account
ADD_ACCOUNT.ACCOUNT_ADDED_SUCCESS: New account was added to the wallet: {{name}}
ADD_ACCOUNT.TITLE: Add new account
ADD_ACCOUNT.DESCRIPTION: Write your password to decrypt your wallet and add a new account

ADD_HORIZON_API.NAME_EXPLANATION: The name of the Horizon API is just a way to identify it in other places of the wallet

EDIT_WALLET_NAME.EXPLANATION: The name of the Wallet is not recorded on the Blockchain. It's only for information purposes.

LAB.MERGE_ACCOUNT_DISCLAIMER: When you merge an account, the remaining XLMs will be sent and the account removed from the ledger.
LAB.NOTICE: This section includes operations that could be dangerous if you don't know what you're doing. Be careful.
LAB.SIGN_XDR_MESSAGE:
Use the "Copy Signed" after you have signed an XDR to get the signed version of the XDR.
The XDR you pasted won't be modified.

CREATE_ACCOUNT.CONNECT_OPEN_APP: Connect your wallet to your computer and open the Stellar App before continuing
CREATE_ACCOUNT.CONNECT_BEFORE_CONTINUE: Connect your wallet to your computer before continuing
CREATE_ACCOUNT.SAFE_PLACE: Write these words in a safe place, this is the only time we will show it to you and is not possible to recover it
CREATE_ACCOUNT.SET_PASSWORD: Set a password for your Wallet, this password will be used to encrypt, lock and transact with your wallet.
CREATE_ACCOUNT.CANT_UPDATE: It can’t be updated if the Wallet is locked.
CREATE_ACCOUNT.SECRET_KEY_TYPE: You're creating a secret keys wallet, this kind of wallet don't have words you could use to restore it. Please keep a copy of your private keys before you import them.
CREATE_ACCOUNT.WRITE_AND_CONFIRM: Write and confirm your words in the input below
CREATE_ACCOUNT.IMPORT_MORE_LATER: If you want to import more public keys later, go to settings and add the wallet again. Select all the public keys to include and they will be included in the same wallet record.
CREATE_ACCOUNT.ADD_LATER_TREZOR: If you add again a Trezor wallet with the same ID, the wallets will be merged. Updating the wallet name later does not affect the wallet ID.

CONNECT.HAVENT_USED_BEFORE: Looks like you haven't used xBull Wallet before, please go to https://wallet.xbull.app, set up your wallet and then retry.
CONNECT.ONLY_CONNECT_TRUST: You should only connect to sites you trust
CONNECT.ONLY_SIGN_TRUST: You should only sign transactions from sites you trust

CLAIMABLE_BALANCES.NO_AIRDROPS: There are no airdrops waiting to be claimed
CLAIMABLE_BALANCES.AUTO_TRUST_ASSET: If you claim an asset you don't trust yet, the operation will be added to the claim transaction automatically

HARD_CONFIRM.TITLE: Confirm Process
HARD_CONFIRM.ALERT_MESSAGE: Please confirm you want to processed
HARD_CONFIRM.DOUBLE_THINK: Double check before confirming this action, if you're sure about this click the confirm button

PASSWORD_MODAL.REASON: Your password is used to decrypt your private key

IMPORT_BACKUP.TITLE: Import & Backup
IMPORT_BACKUP.DROP_KEY_FILE: Drop the key file or click to search
IMPORT_BACKUP.DROP_BACKUP_FILE: Drop the backup file or click to search
IMPORT_BACKUP.IMPORTING_MESSAGE: Importing a new snapshot will remove everything in your wallet and add the data from the backup file
IMPORT_BACKUP.EXPORT_DESCRIPTION: Exporting the data from your wallet will generate two files, one file will include an encrypted state of your wallet and the other file will include the key to decrypt it
IMPORT_BACKUP.EXPORT_RECOMMENDATION: We recommend you saving each file on different places
